text:
From Russia with love

Leonardo DiCaprio has received a customised Oscar statuette from a group of Russian filmmakers celebrating his performance in The Revenant .

The trophy the actor has received, holds a Choron instead of a sword, in a substitution symbolising peace. DiCaprio shared the picture of the “wonderful gift” on Instagram. “Thank you to the people of Yakutia for this wonderful gift, especially all of the women who gathered and donated the materials that went into creating the statue. As they wrote in their letter, Yakutia is home to the coldest inhabited place on Earth — and the region is extremely vulnerable to climate change.

— PTI
title: ENT-DICAPRIO
